Text: Re Hi TomKevin Im glad to hear youre still working I think At least in the pipeline group you have some hard assets to support the business I have been thinking about everyone we used to work with since this whole thing hit the fan I have a number of clients and friends who have been hit hard by the stock price meltdown One fellow I fly with is in his s retired and has lost so much he is having to go back to work All of the retirees are wondering about their pension payouts Hows your retirement plan holding up Greet Lou and the kids and anyone else from the old days who is still around Let me know how things are going And DONT shred this email Tom Pflug office home
